room descriptions.intro_text_long: As you made you way to land on Monarch, you noticed it was tidally locked toward its sun, but at the terminator line had a lush jungle, so that's where you find yourself now. From up high, the trees were unlike anything you'd ever seen, but still comfortable familiar at the same time.
room descriptions.intro_text_short: You've returned to the terminator line jungle on Monarch, still full of those fascinating flowers and bees.

flower.description: While the flower itself is incredibly beautiful, something about it seems wrong. Of course. It had to be poisonous. Spectacular.

bee.description: You've managed to gently grab the bee-like insect, though that sting in your hand in unpleasant. And yes you're actually feeling better now, rather than worse. A rather unexpected outcome. This is worth keeping.

clearing.description: You managed to find a nice clearing in the jungle to set your ship down in. Unexpectedly, when you disembark, you hear a faint buzzing in the air. You expected more general silence. But regardless, you carry on, and also notice something like a archway of trees to the north of where you landed.

tree archway.description: The archway itself is beautiful, but also clearly a natural occurrence rather than something sculpted or created.

pleasant jungle grove.description: While the forest is full of flowers, as you might expect, the strangest thing is that there appear to be a number of bee-like insects flying around. You certainly didn't expect to run into any life out here. Both the flowers and the bees are beautiful.
